content.question: A countryâ€™s economy is in equilibrium at point <math alttext="H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following policies would be most effective to reduce the price level in the short run?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
